conbody.p: Parts 501–552 and 570 prescribe the requirements for use of GSA forms illustrated or referenced in this part. You may identify the prescription as follows:

li.p:
(a)
Forms available on-line. The list of forms available on-line in 553.370-1 identifies the basic prescription for each referenced form.

(b)
Illustrated forms. The prescription for each illustrated form is identified by a cross-reference shown on the illustration. When a form is mentioned in more than one place in this regulation, the section referenced on the illustration is the section that contains the basic prescription.
